items.summary: Update the global light theme color tokens so the app uses: main background #D6F0FF, cards/sections #FFFFFF, primary headings #2B2B2B, and primary buttons #FFE066 with dark text, without changing any app behavior or CRUD flows.

Keep changes focused to styling only: do not refactor components, routes, queries, or state management; only adjust the minimum CSS/theme variables and any minimal, directly-related hardcoded color classes that prevent the new theme colors from applying.
